channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Teddy Swims’ “Lose Control” Breaks Record For Most Weeks In The Hot 100
item.description: Teddy Swims is making waves with "Lose Control" 🎶🌊 Breaking records and hearts on the Hot 100! 💥 #TeddySwims #LoseControl

item.title: Ravyn Lenae Announces Autumn 2025 Tour
item.description: 🍂✨ Ravyn Lenae is hitting the road this fall! Who else is ready for some live music vibes? 🎶 #RavynLenaeTour2025

item.title: Cameron Winter to Play Carnegie Hall on U.S. Tour
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to be swept off your feet! Cameron Winter is bringing his magic to Carnegie Hall on his U.S. tour! 🎹✨ #MusicMonday

item.title: Wet Leg Drop New Single “CPR”: Stream
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the infectious new track "CPR" by Wet Leg! Press play and get ready to groove! 💃🎸 #NewMusicAlert #WetLeg #CPR

item.title: Gorillaz to Play First Three Albums in Full at Special 25th Anniversary Celebration
item.description: 🎉 Get ready to vibe with Gorillaz as they rock their first three albums at their 25th-anniversary bash! 🎶🦍 #Gorillaz25 #MusicNews
